Class GameObj

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObj
  • public class GameObj
extends java.lang.Object
    An object in the game, represented as a rectangle, with a position, a size, a colour and a direction of movement. This class is instanced in Model.initialiseGame()

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      javafx.scene.paint.Color colour
      Colour of object
      int dirX
      Movement value in the X dimension (1, 0 or -1)
      int dirY
      Movement value in the Y dimension (1, 0 or -1)
      int height
      Height of object
      int topX
      Position from the top left corner in the X dimesion (left to right)
      int topY
      Position from the top left corner in the Y dimesion (top to bottom)
      boolean visible
      Controls the visibility of the object
      int width
      Width of the object

        Returns:
